answers.answer: Call your pharmacist and doctor, to see if you are having an allergy reaction to your medications.

You want to get an MRI to check your brain stem,for a growth on one of your 7 crainal nurves. I sounds like the fifth nurve is being affected, Remember it is only a possibility, so please get with your doctor asap.

question: I have a numbness on the right side of my face.I take medication for high blood pressure as well as diabetes (type 2).No other symptoms at this time.Any ideas?
title: Face numbness
